DOC.brief_title: EASH Dressing Chronic Venous Leg Ulcers
DOC.criteria: Subjects 18 year , willing able provide write informed consent . Subjects ankle brachial pressure index ( ABPI ) 0.8 great Subjects venous leg ulcer ( i.e . CEAP classification C6 1 ) , duration le 24 month size range 5 cm240 cm2 . Subjects ' leg ulcer meet least 3 5 follow clinical sign infection : pain two dressing change , periulcer skin erythema/inflammation , oedema , malodour ( foul odour ) , heavy exudate . Subjects agree wear compression therapy daily combination trial dress . Subjects history skin sensitivity component study product . Subjects current local systemic antibiotic week prior inclusion exception wound consider clinically infected baseline . Subjects whose leg ulcer malignant , recent deep venous thrombosis venous surgery within last 3 month . Subjects progressive neoplastic lesion treat radiotherapy chemotherapy , ongoing treatment immunosuppressive agent Subjects exhibit medical condition , accord Investigator , justify subject 's exclusion study Subjects participate clinical study within past month .
